column4: can anyone help me? I cant get .mp3 files to play, or DVDs to play...?
you installed it from the ubuntu package?
you can't log in as the root user, using the password from the mysql-server README.Debian?
does it matter that i change the login details in the config.inc.php file?
I don't know that you need to touch that
I hope you changed the root password already...
I don't know what might have changed; in thie channel, yes.
